title: Nursing Practical Competency Strengthening: Mobile Math Learning Design Workshop for 40-Year-Old Office Workers

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary mathematical concepts and administrative work experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply methods for calculating basic statistics (mean, standard deviation) required in their work using mobile apps.
Learners can design personalized learning pathways to complete 15-minute math practice sessions at least three times per week
Learners can revise their learning plans by incorporating formative assessment feedback through mobile quiz tools

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
